# Hyphens

## Usage

For detailed information, please consult the Tailwind CSS documentation.

## Compatibility

| Class                  | Support     |
| ---------------------- | ----------- |
| `hyphens-none`         | 🌐 Web only |
| `hyphens-manual`       | 🌐 Web only |
| `hyphens-auto`         | 🌐 Web only |
